original_text: At Caesarea there was a man named Cornelius, a centurion of what was known as the Italian Cohort,
korean_text: 가이사랴에 고넬료라 하는 사람이 있으니 이달리야 부대라 하는 군대의 백부장이라

sentences.original_text: At Caesarea there was a man named Cornelius,
sentences.korean_translation: 가이사랴에 고넬료라 하는 한 사람이 있으니,

sentences.original_text: a centurion of what was known as the Italian Cohort,
